Articles.Content:
Some of you may remember my thread from a while back about Jebediah's memorial. (This one http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/63901-Quick-question-where-to-memorialize-Jeb)

So I was moving my crane into position to transport the memorial to it's final resting place (next to the MK1 pod)...

And who do I see driving?

No...

It can't be...

Seriously?

Jebediah is one cheeky *******.

I MAY have forgotten to set crewsrespawn to 0.

Drop the memorial and crash the crane into the VAB.

There you go.

I may just keep poor Jeb around.

He only died in the first place because I foolishly 4x time-warped in the atmosphere with FAR installed. His rocket just kinda imploded.

It was more of an unfortunate bug than a fitting death for our brave hero.

I see his rebirth as a second chance, If you will.
Probably gave himself a very touching eulogy.

Probably gave himself a very touching eulogy.

The thought of it makes me laugh.
Place the memorial anyways, and then place ANOTHER memorial next to it for EVERY time Jeb dies (even if the flight is reverted after he dies, place a memorial anyways).

Place the memorial anyways, and then place ANOTHER memorial next to it for EVERY time Jeb dies (even if the flight is reverted after he dies, place a memorial anyways).

Jeb is actualy insane because he has died so many times, only to wake up again in a cold sweat.

Jeb is actualy insane because he has died so many times, only to wake up again in a cold sweat.

Groundhog Day 2: Moar Boosters

I wonder if Bill Murray could be a convincing Jeb.

Jeb just respawns if you kill him, just like Bill and Bob.

Do you know why?

It's because inside the building everyone THINKS is gonna be mission control, there is actually the KSC cloning tanks and snack refrigeration department.

True story
Jebediah is so awesome that he can bury himself
